structure.unit: TRAFFIC REGULATIONS -- VEHICLE EQUIPMENT AND STORAGE

law.catch_line: Venue and jurisdiction -- Overweight vehicle cases.
law.text: The District Court where the offense occurred shall have venue and jurisdiction with the courts of this Commonwealth of all prosecutions for violations of the weight provisions of KRS 189.221, 189.222, 189.226, 189.230, 189.270 and 189.271.
